Problems/â„ï¸ Overwintering collapse.title: â„ï¸ Overwintering collapse
Problems/â„ï¸ Overwintering collapse.description: Bees can die over the winter if they are too weak as they cannot warm themselves and its brood

Problems/ğŸŒ² Distant locations.title: ğŸŒ² Distant locations
Problems/ğŸŒ² Distant locations.description: If your apiaries are far away (forest, rural area), you need to drive for inspections.

Problems/ğŸŒ» Insufficient pollination.title: ğŸŒ» Insufficient pollination
Problems/ğŸŒ» Insufficient pollination.description: Food security - 735.1M undernourished people worldwide according toÂ FAOÂ in 2022

Problems/ğŸ’ Challenging to become a new.title: ğŸ’ Challenging to become a new beekeeper
Problems/ğŸ’ Challenging to become a new.description: Beekeeping is a vast knowledge area that is hard to gain at the beginning without proper education, keep up to date of.

Problems/ğŸ˜ï¸ Multiple apiaries.title: ğŸ˜ï¸ Multiple apiaries
Problems/ğŸ˜ï¸ Multiple apiaries.description: Related to ğŸ’ªğŸ» Unscalable work, problem is that with growth of the colony numbers, beekeepers need to place bees closer and more even across the land to avoid ğŸŒ» Insufficient pollination

Problems/ğŸ­ Mice killing a colony.title: ğŸ­ Mice killing a colony
Problems/ğŸ­ Mice killing a colony.description: In summer a hive of 50,000 to 60,000 bees can defend itself against intruders like mice. In winter population is reduced to 20,000 bees. Too cold to fly out and defend. The mice urinate and deficate on frames and destroy the wax foundations.

Problems/ğŸ» Bears destroying hives & co.title: ğŸ» Bears destroying hives & colonies
Problems/ğŸ» Bears destroying hives & co.description: Bears attack colonies and they cannot recover after that.

Problems/ğŸ‘ï¸ Observability of bee colo.title: ğŸ‘ï¸ Observability of bee colony
Problems/ğŸ‘ï¸ Observability of bee colo.description: Hard to make decisions without up-to-date and correct information about the colony development. Decisions can be about splitting the hive, treating against varroa mites, closing the hive entrance for defence, adding a new queen, adding or removing frames with brood or honey/polle

Problems/ğŸ’€ Alcohol washing killing be.title: ğŸ’€ Alcohol washing killing bees
Problems/ğŸ’€ Alcohol washing killing be.description: Alcohol-washing bees to detect varroa mites kills 100-300 bees just to have observability

Problems/ğŸ’€ Intrusive inspections.title: ğŸ’€ Intrusive inspections
Problems/ğŸ’€ Intrusive inspections.description: - Squashing of bees when hive sections and frames are moved and placed on top of each other

Problems/ğŸ’¢ Aggressive bee colonies.title: ğŸ’¢ Aggressive bee colonies
Problems/ğŸ’¢ Aggressive bee colonies.description: Hard to inspect, can get stings through the suit

Problems/ğŸ’¢ Hornet attacks.title: ğŸ’¢ Hornet attacks
Problems/ğŸ’¢ Hornet attacks.description: Hornets (Vespa) can wipe out beehive colony

Problems/ğŸ’ªğŸ» Physical labor.title: ğŸ’ªğŸ» Physical labor
Problems/ğŸ’ªğŸ» Physical labor.description: Lifting hive sections with honey, especially being in a suit while its hot outside

Problems/ğŸ’ªğŸ» Unscalable work.title: ğŸ’ªğŸ» Unscalable work
Problems/ğŸ’ªğŸ» Unscalable work.description: Linear scaling of physical work as you add more hives and as they grow in height

Problems/ğŸ“¦ Warehouse organization.title: ğŸ“¦ Warehouse organization
Problems/ğŸ“¦ Warehouse organization.description: Beekeepers need to maintain various warehouse management tasks and organize their equipment

Problems/ğŸ—ƒï¸ Flimsy beehives.title: ğŸ—ƒï¸ Flimsy beehives
Problems/ğŸ—ƒï¸ Flimsy beehives.description: Weather can have detrimental effect on the colony survival.

Problems/ğŸ—ƒï¸ Poor hive ventilation.title: ğŸ—ƒï¸ Poor hive ventilation
Problems/ğŸ—ƒï¸ Poor hive ventilation.description: Some beehives have poor ventilation. Bees during winter die because of this â„ï¸ Overwintering collapse

Problems/ğŸ—ƒï¸ Ugly beehives.title: ğŸ—ƒï¸ Ugly beehives
Problems/ğŸ—ƒï¸ Ugly beehives.description: - Bricks on roof against the wind

Problems/ğŸ¦€ Infestations.title: ğŸ¦€ Infestations
Problems/ğŸ¦€ Infestations.description: Hive infestations weaken colonies, lead to viral infections, cause deformed wings, uncapped pupae

Problems/ğŸ§¶ Swarming.title: ğŸ§¶ Swarming
Problems/ğŸ§¶ Swarming.description: Swarming is natural and good. This is how bee colony reproduces.
